kv2.2:1.3_0: Atthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:1.5_0: Natthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:1.7_0: Hañci natthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:2.1_0: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṁ, atthi tassa avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:2.3_0: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṁ, atthi tassa avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:3.1_0: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṁ, natthi tassa avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:3.3_0: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṁ, natthi tassa avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ avijjāsaṁyojanaṁ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:4.3_0: Arahā aññāṇapakato pāṇaṁ haneyya, adinnaṁ ādiyeyya, musā bhaṇeyya, pisuṇaṁ bhaṇeyya, pharusaṁ bhaṇeyya, samphaṁ palapeyya, sandhiṁ chindeyya, nillopaṁ hareyya, ekāgāriyaṁ kareyya, paripanthe tiṭṭheyya, paradāraṁ gaccheyya, gāmaghātaṁ kareyya, nigamaghātaṁ kareyyāti?
kv2.2:5.1_0: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṁ, puthujjano aññāṇapakato pāṇaṁ haneyya, adinnaṁ ādiyeyya, musā bhaṇeyya …pe… gāmaghātaṁ kareyya, nigamaghātaṁ kareyyāti?
kv2.2:5.3_0: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṁ, arahā aññāṇapakato pāṇaṁ haneyya, adinnaṁ ādiyeyya …pe… gāmaghātaṁ kareyya, nigamaghātaṁ kareyyāti?
kv2.2:6.1_0: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṁ, na ca arahā aññāṇapakato pāṇaṁ haneyya, adinnaṁ ādiyeyya …pe… gāmaghātaṁ kareyya, nigamaghātaṁ kareyyāti?
kv2.2:6.3_0: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṁ, na ca puthujjano aññāṇapakato pāṇaṁ haneyya, adinnaṁ ādiyeyya …pe… gāmaghātaṁ kareyya, nigamaghātaṁ kareyyāti?
kv2.2:7.3_0: Atthi arahato satthari aññāṇaṁ, dhamme aññāṇaṁ, saṅghe aññāṇaṁ, sikkhāya aññāṇaṁ, pubbante aññāṇaṁ, aparante aññāṇaṁ, pubbantāparante aññāṇaṁ, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:8.1_0: Natthi arahato satthari aññāṇaṁ, dhamme aññāṇaṁ, saṅghe aññāṇaṁ, sikkhāya aññāṇaṁ, pubbante aññāṇaṁ, aparante aññāṇaṁ, pubbantāparante aññāṇaṁ, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:8.3_0: Hañci natthi arahato satthari aññāṇaṁ, dhamme aññāṇaṁ, saṅghe aññāṇaṁ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:9.1_0: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṁ, atthi tassa satthari aññāṇaṁ, dhamme aññāṇaṁ, saṅghe aññāṇaṁ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:9.3_0: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṁ, atthi tassa satthari aññāṇaṁ, dhamme aññāṇaṁ, saṅghe aññāṇaṁ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:10.1_0: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṁ, natthi tassa satthari aññāṇaṁ, dhamme aññāṇaṁ, saṅghe aññāṇaṁ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:10.3_0: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṁ, natthi tassa satthari aññāṇaṁ, dhamme aññāṇaṁ, saṅghe aññāṇaṁ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:11.3_0: Nanu arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammoti?
kv2.2:11.5_0: Hañci arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:12.5_0: anottappaṁ pahīnaṁ ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammanti?
kv2.2:12.7_0: Hañci arahato anottappaṁ pahīnaṁ ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:13.6_0: Hañci arahato rāgappahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:14.8_0: Hañci arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:15.7_0: sacchikātabbaṁ sacchikataṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:16.2_0: Sadhammakusalassa arahato atthi aññāṇaṁ, paradhammakusalassa arahato natthi aññāṇanti.
kv2.2:18.1_0: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:18.3_0: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:19.5_0: Paradhammakusalassa arahato anottappaṁ pahīnaṁ, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:20.4_0: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgappahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:21.6_0: Paradhammakusalassa arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:23.1_0: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:23.3_0: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:24.5_0: Sadhammakusalassa arahato anottappaṁ pahīnaṁ, natthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:25.7_0: Sadhammakusalassa arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, natthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:27.4_0: “jānatohaṁ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṁ khayaṁ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
kv2.2:27.5_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti?
kv2.2:27.6_0: ‘Iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo, iti vedanā …pe…
kv2.2:27.9_0: iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti—
kv2.2:27.10_0: evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti.
kv2.2:28.4_0: “jānatohaṁ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṁ khayaṁ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
kv2.2:28.5_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti?
kv2.2:28.7_0: bhikkhave, jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti, ‘ayaṁ dukkhasamudayo’ti—
kv2.2:28.8_0: jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti, ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodho’ti—
kv2.2:28.9_0: jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti, ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti—
kv2.2:28.11_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti.
kv2.2:29.4_0: “sabbaṁ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṁ aparijānaṁ avirājayaṁ appajahaṁ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya, sabbañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṁ parijānaṁ virājayaṁ pajahaṁ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
kv2.2:33.4_0: “yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvakassa virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi—
kv2.2:33.5_0: ‘yaṁ kiñci samudayadhammaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhamman’ti, saha dassanuppādā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṁyojanāni pahīyanti—
kv2.2:34.4_0: Nanu arahā itthipurisānaṁ nāmagottaṁ na jāneyya, maggāmaggaṁ na jāneyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṁ nāmaṁ na jāneyyāti?
kv2.2:34.6_0: Hañci arahā itthipurisānaṁ nāmagottaṁ na jāneyya, maggāmaggaṁ na jāneyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṁ nāmaṁ na jāneyya, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:35.1_0: Arahā itthipurisānaṁ nāmagottaṁ na jāneyya, maggāmaggaṁ na jāneyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṁ nāmaṁ na jāneyyāti, atthi arahato aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:35.3_0: Arahā sotāpattiphalaṁ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vā anāgāmiphalaṁ vā arahattaṁ vā na jāneyyāti?
